name: Lane Switch
description:
A GAME ABOUT SWITCHING LANES!

(This is my first game i consider "finished and publishable")

You are travelling in space on your ship, there are various obstacles, some that you can dodge, some another friendly ship of yours can. You must switch lanes with each other in order to dodge the right obstacles and move on to your endless journey.

On the way, you may collect coins to buy various things such as unlocking new powerups, upgrades, new ships(characters) and more.

There are 3 difficulty modes :

1) CLASSIC

2) HARD

3) EPIC (There is a surprise!)

Can you get the highest score ever possible? Play to find out now!
